DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , placebo control study . The first subject expect enrol July 2014 , last subject expect complete study July 2015 . Each subject provide PRN Joint Comfort Formula , placebo PRN Flex Omega Benefits® combination depend randomization ( 1:1:1 site ) course study . Instructions frequency use determine labelling .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Of Natural Anti-Inflammatory Product On Levels Of Inflammatory Markers In Cases With Osteoarthritis Of Knee
DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 ≤ 90 time inform consent . Subjects symptomatic moderate arthritis knee define per KellgrenLawrence grade II III ( Appendix B ) . Subjects bilateral arthritis knee also recruit , one knee enrol study . Ability walk 50 foot unassisted . Lequesne 's Functional Index score great 7 point Subjects systemic inflammatory condition inflammatory bowel disease , psoriasis , eczema , others Subjects seropositive seronegative inflammatory arthritis knee rheumatoid arthritis ankylose spondylitis . Subjects take hormone replacement therapy Intraarticular corticosteroid injection 3 week prior enrollment . Hypersensitivity fish oil . Hypersensitivity nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug , abnormal liver kidney function test , history peptic ulceration upper gastrointestinal hemorrhage , congestive heart failure , Hypertension ( BP > 140/90 ) , cancer hyperkalemia . Major abnormal finding complete blood count , history coagulopathies , hematological neurological disorder . High alcohol intake ( > 2 standard drink per day ) . Pregnant , breastfeed plan become pregnant study Subjects await surgery affect knee within three month . Consumption vitamins/supplements allow , provide dose increase , brand continue . Also , regimen contain active compound test PRN Joint health formula product . Vitamins/supplements introduce subject 's participation study .
